Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Objective: Reclaim the theater and cast out all enemies!
Level.Unit: 0,1,Irate Crossbow Aficionado/,9,5,Down,EFv-55 Replica With Realistic Uncomfortable Recoil Action[E]
Level.Script: Set Lesbian Talkable Run/AddTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetString/Nobeta Lifts Can Talk,Nobeta Lifts
Set Lesbian Not Talkable Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Nobeta Lifts,Speaker Two,Mary O Nette SetString/Nobeta Lifts Can Talk,INVALID
Arora Shift Roll SetVal/Random,r:2 IfValRun/Random,=,0,Try Replace Arora Feminine IfValRun/Random,=,1,Try Replace Arora Masculine
Try Replace Arora Masculine IfValRun/AroraGender,=,0,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Arora,Swap In Name,Arora,Swap In ID,Arora:Masculine SetVal/AroraGender,=:1
Try Replace Arora Feminine IfValRun/AroraGender,=,1,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Arora,Swap In Name,Arora,Swap In ID,Arora:Feminine SetVal/AroraGender,=:0

SetAreas SetArea/StartingArea,11,13,6,12 SetArea/Choke,11,13,4,8
SetArea/WestApproach,6,13,0,5 SetArea/ViewingBooth,0,3,11,12 SetArea/Stage,1,5,4,7 SetArea/Theater,0,8,0,12 SetArea/ClothingZone,0,7,0,3

Lever Flipped SpawnUnit/99,Red Pride Light,1,3,Down SpawnUnit/99,Orange Pride Light,1,4,Down SpawnUnit/99,Yellow Pride Light,1,5,Down SpawnUnit/99,Green Pride Light,1,6,Down SpawnUnit/99,Blue Pride Light,1,7,Down SpawnUnit/99,Indigo Pride Light,1,8,Down SpawnUnit/99,Violet Pride Light,1,9,Down

Dialogue.trigger: OnTalk/Mary O Nette,-STR:Nobeta Lifts Can Talk-
Dialogue.Branch: / Run/Set Lesbian Not Talkable SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,+:1 IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,1,Go To First Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,2,Go To Second Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,3,Go To Third Lesbian Dialogue EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/First Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Second Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Third Lesbian Dialogue

/ SetVal/Turn Trigger,+:1 SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,+:1 IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,1,SetString,AndrasReadyToShave,Andras Winterbloom SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,-:1 SetVal/MoreLesbianDiscussions,=:0 IfValRun/Lesbian Discussions,l,3,_SetVal,ValueName,MoreLesbianDiscussions,Value,1 Run/IsAllTrue_2,ValueOneName,MoreLesbianDiscussions,ValueOneCompareTo,1,ValueTwoName,TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,ValueTwoCompareTo,12 IfValRun/AnswerComposite,g=,1,Set Lesbian Talkable IfValRun/Arora Alive,=,0,Arora Shift Roll Log/'-VAL:TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo-' '-VAL:Lesbian Discussions-' '-VAL:MoreLesbianDiscussions-' '-VAL:AnswerComposite-' GoTo/1
/ LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch EndConvImmediately/

/ SetVal/AroraGender,=:0 SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,=:0 Run/Set Lesbian Talkable SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,0 SetString/Asandr Current Name,Drasan Winterbloom SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:-1 SetVal/Turn Trigger,=:0 IfValGoTo/Skip Dialogue,=,1,999 SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=:0 SetVal/Sandra Attacks,=:0 AddTagToArmy/1,IgnoreArmy,2 SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,=:0 Run/SetAreas IfValGoTo/SkipIntro,=,1,9 SetVal/Clark Alive,=:0 GoToNextBranch/ SetStat/ID[901],Damage,=:40
Drasan Winterbloom/W--what? The theater! People are--? AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,right,,Shocked MoveCam/,,Drasan Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch

Xander Bilt/[He grumbles and stomps as he walks] Bah, Strider! Curse your name! Curse this theater for [i]celebrating[/i] your name! Enough of it all. Rubble Rousers, tear this place down! ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander Bilt,left,,YellMad MoveCam/,,Xander Bilt Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Bruiser/The boss says this place has got to go! No one supporting these shmucks has a place in [b]our[/b] town! ClearPortraits/ MoveCam/,,Rubble Rouser Bruiser AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,left,Red,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Are you daft? Strider's efforts were only truly given life through [b]this[/b] play. Bolt-Action Love is [b]the[/b] essential crossbowpunk love story. Only a ignoramus would miss the subtle metaphors in the play's depiction of cocking. MoveCam/,,Loud Theater Enjoyer AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Crossbowwhatsit? Look, anything Strider, it's gotta go. Ain't she done enough damage? ChangeExpression/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/That Rubble Rouser guy is right! We don't have to stand for this! We can take matters in to our own hands! We can tear down this injust favoritism for over-hyped product line crossbows! RemovePortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,Red,Angry MoveCam/,,Irate Crossbow Aficionado Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Uh, yeah. Yeah! Whatever gets your engine going, get smashing. ChangeExpression/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Bwuh?! Rubble Rousers? Hey, they're tearing up the place! Everyone, get your community defense face on, it's time to wrassle! ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien/Lifts,left,,Yell MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,18,0,60 Continue./NextBranch
/ MoveCam/,,Harrien Lifts EndConvImmediately/

Nobeta Lifts/This is wild. Gotta get a grip... [Nobeta shakes her head] Oh, hey, Mary! AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Blank AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Happy FlipPortrait/Mary O Nette MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,5,0,100 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/Oh, Nobeta Lifts. It is time to fight strange bad people, hmm? Do not worry, I will be there if you are ever harmed. FlipPortrait/Mary O Nette MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,18,0,80 Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/I should worry about you! Get behind me, and we will chase these goons out. WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,8,0,150,false FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/It can be as you say. It can be time to... get behind you. ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Happy SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Mary O Nette,Yellow SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:1 SetStat/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Heart / MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,15,0,80 Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Perhaps [b]she[/b] can call me little girl. That would be acceptable. AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Winking Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/...ah, Nobeta Lifts. [She looks up at her] Behind you, yes? AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Concerned ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Concerned Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Of course! Dad always said to me, "these muscles are for protecting you, little girl." ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Kind Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/O--oh. [She pauses] Yes. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Blank Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta Lifts/Well, let's go! [Nobeta grabs Mary's arm and leads towards her next firing position] WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts,-5,0,100 MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,5,0,100 FlipPortrait/Mary O Nette Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/O--oh. [She stumbles along, easily moved by Nobeta Lifts] Yes. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:2 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 2,Mary O Nette,Yellow SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 1,Nobeta Lifts,Yellow SetStat/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/Hey, Nobeta Lifts, when it is... time after the battle, would you--? AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta Lifts,right FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/[Nobeta Lifts flexes as she gives Mary her attention] Ah, what was that? FlipPortrait/Nobeta Lifts Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Goodness alright calm down. PortraitParticles/Mary O Nette,Hearts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Hmm? Ah, what? Something about after this battle? ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/After this battle, would you have time for... a date? Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta Lifts/Oh! Oh! [She pauses and stares in to middle-space] Oh. Yes, actually. Plenty of time. Oh, but now, I need to... ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Happy SetStat/Nobeta Lifts,Morale,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Nobeta Lifts,Yellow SetStat/Mary O Nette,Morale,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Mary O Nette,Yellow SetVal/Mary O Nette,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Mary O Nette,Yellow / Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/[Nobeta gets in to position and flexes to draw her bow string] Yes. For this time, please keep doing... the things you are doing. RemovePortrait/Nobeta Lifts Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Nobeta Lifts SetVal/Lesbian Discussions,+:1 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/Man, I really don't wanna fight you. I was really hoping someone else would handle you... look at those arms! You could tear me apart! AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left,,Concerned AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien Lifts,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Harrien Lifts/...Well, that just sucks all the fun out of fighting you. What's someone so meek doing with this lot? ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Kind Continue./NextBranch
Clark/I... really don't know. I've been trying to find where it went wrong, but all I can really conclude is that I made very dumb decisions. ChangeExpression/Clark,Concerned Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/Sounds like a lot of us, honestly. ...Look, I can't undo the stuff you've been dealt;; but I can offer you an out. C'mon and join us! If you're on the field, you must have some skill, right? ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Excited Continue./NextBranch
Clark/W-w-what? Um, I... no;; I'd really just weigh you down. Continue./NextBranch
Harrien Lifts/Hey, c'mon;; look at these guns. A little extra weight won't bug me. ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Happy MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,8,0,110 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/...W-well;; okay. ...Thank you. SetStat/Clark,Army,=:0 Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Clark,Swap In Name,Clark,Swap In ID,Clark:Happy ChangeExpression/Clark,Happy SetStat/Clark,Morale,+:4 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 4,Clark,Yellow RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized SetVal/WestApproachFlag,3 Run/RemoveTalkability,Speaker One,Clark,Speaker Two,Harrien Lifts SetVal/Clark Alive,=:1 Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/Oh, what do we have here? [Drasan sees an open container of clothes for performers] This is... AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan nervously grabs an outfit from the chest] ChangeExpression/Drasan Winterbloom,Concerned Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/I could... use a change. SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Run/Asandr Progresses Script AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Happy PortraitParticles/Andras Winterbloom,Heart Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Andras Winterbloom Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Andras Winterbloom SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Dodge,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Dodge + 3,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Accuracy,+:5 SpawnFloatingText/Accuracy + 5,Andras Winterbloom,Yellow SetVal/Drasan Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Andras Winterbloom Alive,=:1 Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/If I can change anything, then... [Andras carefully presses a sword to their lip] SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Nervous Continue./NextBranch

Sandra Winterbloom/...that feels much better. AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,,Happy PortraitParticles/Sandra Winterbloom,Heart SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Asandr Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Sandra Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Sandra Winterbloom Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Sandra Winterbloom AddStatus/Asandr Winterbloom,Talkable SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 3,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Dodge,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Dodge + 3,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Accuracy,+:5 SpawnFloatingText/Accuracy + 5,Sandra Winterbloom,Yellow SetVal/Andras Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=:1 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/I mean;; maybe the author made a small mistake about the bolt-head manufacturer, but-- AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left,,Concerned AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Irate Crossbow Aficiando/A small mistake! Lakshmi would never be caught dead wi- [The scuffle outside rattles the windows] ChangeExpression/Clark,Sad Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/Argh;; there's never enough time to educate arbalest-ignorants! Let's teach them proper technique! ChangeExpression/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Mean FlipPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado Continue./NextBranch
Clark/Uh... alright... ChangeExpression/Clark,Neutral Continue./NextBranch

Clark/[He sighs] I thought that boss guy was cute enough to spend a weekend with his pals, but... Second thoughts. ClearPortraits/Clark ChangeExpression/Clark,Headache RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Passive RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Inactive SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Golem,6,0,Down,,Add:ID:901 SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,6,1,Down,,Add:LevelUp:4::Add:ID:902 SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=,2 Run/AddTalkability,Speaker One,Clark,Speaker Two,Harrien Lifts SetStat/ID[901],Turn Ended,true SetStat/ID[902],Turn Ended,true Continue./LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch
/ SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:1 RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Inactive RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Passive RemoveConv/WestApproach Recognized EndConvImmediately/ /

Mary O Nette/Finally time to wear something more comfortable, hmm? AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,left,,Happy AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,right,,Happy IfValRun/Nobeta Lifts Can Talk,=,Nobeta Lifts,Run,_AddStatus,Mary O Nette,Talkable Run/Remove Talkability,Speaker One,Mary O Nette,Speaker Two,Sandra Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch
Sandra Winterbloom/Ahah, yea, this... felt more fitting. Just wish I could do something more with my hair. Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/Y'know, I actually do have something for that. Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/And... there. / PortraitParticles/Asandr Winterbloom,Sparkles AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom/,Asandr Winterbloom/,right,,Happy Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Asandr Winterbloom Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Sandra Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Asandr Winterbloom,Swap In ID,Asandr Winterbloom SetStat/Asandr Winterbloom,Morale,+:2 SpawnFloatingText/Morale + 2,Asandr Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Asandr Winterbloom,Dodge,+:3 SpawnFloatingText/Dodge + 3,Asandr Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Asandr Winterbloom,Accuracy,+:5 SpawnFloatingText/Accuracy + 5,Asandr Winterbloom,Yellow SetStat/Asandr Winterbloom,Psy,+:1 SpawnFloatingText/Psy + 1,Asandr Winterbloom,Yellow SetVal/Sandra Winterbloom Alive,=:0 SetVal/Asandr Winterbloom Alive,=:1 Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/Aaah, I love it! And should write different, better, or more dialogue here to express that! :D Continue./NextBranch
/ SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=:1 EndConvImmediately/
/ IfValGoTo/WestApproachFlag,=,1,1 IfValGoTo/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=,0,2 EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/West Approach Recognized GoTo/0
/ LoadConv/Boss Spawn SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:-1 GoTo/0

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Rubble Rousers, entitled critics, bah. You clearly don't see the metaphors for bittersweet sorrow in the choice of Lakshmi's bolts. AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Golem/WRONG OPINION DETECTED. AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Golem,Rubble Rouser Golem,right,,Neutral Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/And what even [b]is[/b] "over centralization" of such a crucial crossbow. Everyone knows the 20DV changed the world. Fools! AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Ey keep it down up there! We're busy! AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Yell Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Did you even pick up on [b]any[/b] of the subthemes about recoil representing revolution? And you dare say you know this craft! AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/You dare?! That's it, this gas blob is getting it, too! [They hurrumph and start towards the stairs] AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado/,right,,YellMad RemoveTagFromArmy/1,IgnoreArmy,2 RemoveTagFromGroup/2,Inactive RemoveTagFromGroup/2,Passive SpawnUnit/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,1,8,Right,,Add:LevelUp:3::Add:TargetPreference:Loud Theater Enjoyer:=::9,Sorrow-Less Recoil Crossbow[E] Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Bah, what are you supposed to be? You're so freakishly tall! Put those muscles away, you're embarassing yourself. AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien Lifts,left,,Mean,5,0 AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Harrien Lifts/You cannot hurt me with your words. [He grunts] I will hurt you with my axe. ChangeExpression/Harrien Lifts,Yell ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated MovePortrait/Harrien Lifts,10,0,60 Wait/.5 ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Concerned Continue./EndConv

Coderick Gutterson/Well look who inherited her father's huge body! Grah, you can't attract men like me with [b]that[/b] hair cut. AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Shocked Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/W--well, good! [She grunts] I don't want to attract men like you! ChangeExpression/Nobeta Lifts,Irritated ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Huh, I can barely see you. You must not be important! Do everyone a favor and grow up, you little girl! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,right,,Quizzical,5,0 Continue./NextBranch

Mary O Nette/[b]You[/b] do not get to call me a little girl. Show respect, creep. ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated ChangeExpression/Mary O Nette,Mean MovePortrait/Mary O Nette,6,0 Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Ech, what are you even going for? Make up your mind! I, Coderick Gutterson, and the rest of [b]civil[/b] society need to know if you're a man or not! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Arora,Arora/Feminine,right,,Winking Continue./NextBranch

Arora/Ouch! My turn, how about... Your parents named you Coderick, and you kept that name. ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated ChangeExpression/Arora,Quizzical Wait/.5 FlipPortrait/Arora Wait/.5 FlipPortrait/Arora MovePortrait/Arora,7,0 ChangeExpression/Arora,Amused Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Now doesn't [b]this guy[/b] look entirely uncomfortable. It's your skin, buddy, get used to it! None of us can change what we are, and what I am is a [b]champion among vermin[/b]. AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan absently ponders] You're [b]so[/b] wrong, that I think I just learned something. Thanks? ChangeExpression/Drasan Winterbloom,Quizzical ChangeExpression/Coderick Gutterson,Irritated Continue./NextBranch
/[Good job finding this dialogue! You recruited Clark [b]before[/b] fighting that guy? Way to go.] Continue./NextBranch
Loud Theater Enjoyer/I may have been... somewhat overly vocal. AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Coderick and Harrien Lifts EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/Coderick and Nobeta Lifts EndConvImmediately/

Dialogue.convID: Coderick and Mary O Nette Offense
Dialogue.Branch: / LoadConv/Coderick and Mary O Nette EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/Coderick and Arora EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/Coderick and Drasan EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/Coderick and Drasan EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/So you're the leader of this pro-Strider propaganda affair! Do you understand how much she has ruined my financial affairs!? AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Harrien Lifts,Harrien/Lifts,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Harrien Lifts/I can only think of so many reasons for that, and all of them are worth breaking a chair over your head. Continue./NextBranch
Xander Bilt/It doesn't matter. If I get through you, the theater is as good as destroyed. Take this! Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Harrien EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/If I were you, young lady, I wouldn't follow in your father's foolish footsteps. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad Reference Name,Portrait Name,Facing (left or right),Color Name (optional),Facial Expression (optional),X Position (optional),Y Position (optional),Force Skin Palette (integer -- optional) AddPortrait/Nobeta Lifts,Nobeta/Lifts,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta Lifts/Oh that does it. I'm absolutely beating you up now. Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Nobeta EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/Young man, surely I can provide you a better opportunity than working with this motley crew. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom,Xander/Bilt,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/It's...well it's young woman now. Continue./NextBranch
Xander Bilt/Oh, my apologies. Offer still stands. Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/Absolutely not. Who would want to work with someone like you? Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Asandr EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/...This isn't what I want to be doing with my time. Run away young lady, and I promise on my family name you won't be harmed. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Mary O Nette,Mary O Nette,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Mary O Nette/I'm not going to abandon my friends! Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Mary EndConvImmediately/
Xander Bilt/My my, what rare talents. You're truly wasted here. AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Arora,Arora,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Arora/Thanks, but no thanks. Let's just move onto the scene where I beat you, shall we? Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Arora EndConvImmediately/

Xander Bilt/Clark! Lad, what are you doing? Get back to being obedient and smash the theater, not me and my men! AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander/Bilt,left,,YellMad AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Clark/Oh don't worry, it's not [b]your[/b] men I want to [b]smash[/b]. Continue./NextBranch
/ LoadConv/Xander and Clark EndConvImmediately/
Reminder For Players/[You can save at the start of your turn, using the button on the bottom left of the pop up.] Continue./NextBranch

Xander Bilt/I don't get it! It's a [b]THEATER[/b]! How can you be failing this bad? I'll have to do this myself! AddPortrait/Xander Bilt,Xander Bilt,left,,Angry SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,-1 RemoveTag/Xander Bilt,Inactive RemoveTag/Xander Bilt,IgnoreArmy,3 SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Breaker,6,12,Left,,Add:LevelUp:5::Add:ID:904 SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Breaker,7,12,Left,,Add:LevelUp:5::Add:ID:905 SetStat/ID[904],Turn Ended,true SetStat/ID[905],Turn Ended,true Continue./NextBranch

/ SetVal/Nobeta Lifts Alive,=:0 EndConvImmediately/
/ SetVal/Mary O Nette Alive,=:0 EndConvImmediately/
